name: Fighting is Magic: Aurora
description:
Fighting is Magic: Aurora is a fan-made 2D fighting game based on the popular cartoon series My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic.

The game features a deep combo system, and the characters bring unique 'magic' techniques with them to the battle! Fighting game fans or not, players will enjoy exciting guilty-gear/melty blood-like style gameplay that's easy to understand in minutes, but heavily rewarding to those that dig a bit deeper.

Even if this is your first fighting game or you're a seasoned veteran, you'll easily be able to pick up and play.

FOUR-BUTTON PLAY

Three attack buttons; Light , Medium and Heavy .

Magic offers unique abilities through a secondary resource.

Attack opponents with incresingly stronger buttons to form a combo!

ONLINE NETPLAY

Fight worthy opponents from around the world with built-in Netplay*.

Chat with friends or foes in the lobby and duke it out online! *Netplay provided by Telepone. Telepone is developed by a third-party.

IN-DEPTH STORY

A training mode to help you get to grips with the game.

An in-depth narrative story mode with boss fights.

9+ acts per character with professional writing. 

Visit the main website https://fightingismagic.com for more information.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

Download Size: 848.9 MB

Compatibility: Windows XP SP3, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 & 11

(Requires .NET Framework 4.0 & Visual C++ Redist 2010 x86)
